meaning_str.bing:
n. 索赔；宣称；声明；断言
v. 声称；宣称；认领；索取
网络. 要求；主张

声称；宣称；断言；主张；索赔；索要；要求；认领；获得；提出（权利、要求）；（因工作、努力等）应得；（因质量、重要性等）应受到注意
要求；索赔；索款；主张；权利；所有权；断言；宣称；声称；（尤指对财产、土地等要求拥有的）所有权

1.en: If no such name and address of a solicitor is included in the notice of claim, it shall be regarded as if no notice had been given.
1.cn: 如申索通知书内没有将该等律师的姓名及地址包括在内，则须视作犹如通知书尚未发出一样。

2.en: BC: I would brag that I would allow any bandit that defeated me in solo combat to claim leadership of the camp. It seemed fair, you know?
2.cn: 我曾经夸耀说，任何在单人角斗中打败我的强盗都可以得到营地的领导权。听起来很公平，是吧？

3.en: These records now clearly revealed that the employee's claim was entirely illegitimate; if anyone had a claim to make, it was the firm.
3.cn: 现在的记录显示这位员工的索赔完全是无理取闹；如果非要索赔的话，应该是公司。

0.en: And did you claim that Mr. Ashbaugh was in love with you? Mrs. Florrick?
0.cn: 你当时有没有声称阿什宝先生爱上你了？福瑞克夫人？

1.en: And you also claim that I then acquired this office by pushing out that very same man.
1.cn: 你还声称是我阴谋赶走了他坐上了总统之位。

2.en: You claim you were with Mr. Sweeney the entire time? No, not the entire time.
2.cn: 你声称一直都跟斯威尼先生在一起？不，不是一直在一起。

3.en: I understand. You dispute Newton's claim that he invented calculus and you want to put Gottfried Leibniz on the top.
3.cn: 我明白，你是因为牛顿声称是他发明了微积分而抵触他，你想要把莱布尼茨挂在树顶。

4.en: In the written report, you all claim you didn't even know about the fire until after it happened. But that isn't true, is it? Well? It's not true.
4.cn: 在报告里，你们都声称事后才知道起火了。但这不是事实，对吗？说啊？这不是事实。

5.en: While I would love to claim that this campaign and the result of it are a result of my incredible speech-writing skills, I know that it is not. It is because the ground is fertile.
5.cn: 我虽然很想声称这项行动及其成果是我惊世骇俗的演讲技巧所致，可我知道事实并非如此，这一切都是因为天时地利。

6.en: Blackhand comes to claim the honor of killing you.
6.cn: 黑手要过来杀掉你，从而获得荣耀。

7.en: That's easy, baggage claim. Wrong. Now you're single.
7.cn: 简单，领行李的地方。错了，所以你是单身。

8.en: That's a big fat claim. And I'm gonna try to back it up.
8.cn: 这是一个很大的题目，我会试着证明。

9.en: Bob Dylan again, Your Honor? It's a good claim, Mrs. Florrick. Actually, it's an excellent claim, but unfortunately I can't consider a visa application.
9.cn: 又是鲍勃·迪伦吗？法官阁下。这是个很好的诉求，福瑞克夫人，实际上非常好，但很可惜，我不能考虑签证申请。

10.en: If he finds me before midnight when the masks come off, he can claim his prize.
10.cn: 如果在半夜大家把面具摘下来之前他找到我了，他就能得到一点小奖励。

11.en: The claim was for a diamond necklace his son, Caledon, bought his fiancee, you.
11.cn: 他掉了一条钻石项链，是他儿子买给未婚妻，你的。

12.en: There are very few people out there who can claim to have out-Bonded James Bond.
12.cn: 这世上没几个人可以说自己比詹姆斯·邦德更厉害。

13.en: I did claim that. And did you suggest that you could use his love to manipulate him?
13.cn: 我的确那么说过。那你有没有说过会利用他对你的爱慕，来操纵他呢？

14.en: Now, give me the names. They claim they're the IRA, but I don't know who they really are.
14.cn: 现在，告诉我他们的名字。他们自称是IRA，但我不知道他们的真实身份。

15.en: I don't claim that. President Walker does. Oh, yes. A man made bitter by his own mistakes.
15.cn: 指控你的不是我，是沃克总统。是啊，那个自尝苦果心怀怨愤的男人。

16.en: And the only way it can survive and thrive is for each of you to claim your rightful place.
16.cn: 而它之所以能生存并发展，依靠你们每一个人各司其职。

17.en: Martha is my former boss and an old friend. We speak frequently. Why she would claim that I...
17.cn: 玛莎是我的前任上司和老友，我们经常通话，她为什么要说我……

18.en: The treatments available to the village would be vastly superior to anything we can lay claim to now.
18.cn: 届时村民们能得到的治疗，会比我们现在能提供的先进很多。

19.en: They're all in town for TechWeek. We get them to sign on to an amicus brief in support of your claim.
19.cn: 他们全都在这参加技术周活动，我们让他们签一份非当事人声明，来支持你的诉讼请求。
